conbody.p: After having successfully deployed , you can follow the instructions of the Getting Started page for creating and publishing your first service to a marketplace.
### Is there a sample service and an organization with all required roles available after deployment?###

This chapter summarizes the first steps to be performed for getting started with operating a installation. In addition, it introduces the tools that support you in performing operational tasks.
Configure the platform
Add a currency
Create organizations
Create marketplaces
Publish services to marketplaces
After the deployment, you have access to the administration portal and a command line tool. For a description on how to access the available tools, refer to .

In order for a supplier to be able to define price models and for the rating and billing engine of to be able to calculate usage costs, you need to add one or several currencies to the system. For details, refer to .

In the next step, you can create technology provider and seller organizations (suppliers, resellers, brokers), and set up marketplaces so that services can be offered to customers. For details, refer to and .
